old:
ゲルト騎士団長は義に厚く寛大な御方だ
我々は白竜様とあの方に仕えることに
誇りを感じている
column2:
Commander Gerd is a righteous and generous man.
We are proud
to serve the White Dragon and him.

old:
白竜様の加護があるのは
お前達だけではないぞ、覚者
column2: You are not the only ones who have the blessing of the White Dragon, Arisen.

old:
まったく、ジョゼフ神官は騎士団ではなく
なぜいつも覚者隊ばかり――
column2:
Not at all, Priest Joseph is not a knight
Why is it always the Arisen corps--?

old:
覚者隊の者か
なにか用か
column2:
You're from the Sentinel Corps?
Can I help you?
